thread.title: Trump Administration Plans New Immigration Order Next Week, Ends Legal Push in Appeals Court
thread.title_full: Trump Administration Plans New Immigration Order Next Week, Ends Legal Push in Appeals Court - WSJ

author: Brent Kendall
title: Trump Administration Plans New Immigration Order Next Week, Ends Legal Push in Appeals Court
text:
WASHINGTON—The Justice Department on Thursday told an appeals court there was no reason to reconsider a case on President Donald Trump’s controversial executive order on immigration and refugees because it would be rescinded and replaced.
The move came as Mr. Trump announced he would issue a new order next week.
The developments provided...
